comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: I think that's Charles Comiskey, second from left in front row.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
76016463@N00
comment._content: Found a site that identifies this photo as follows: Top Row: L-R: Unidentified; James Gaffney (Braves); John E. Bruce (Browns); Charles Somers (Indians); unidentified; John I. Taylor (Red Sox); Clark Griffith (Senators); Frank J. Navin (Detroit); Harry M. Grabiner (White Sox' secretary). Bottom Row: L-R: Ben Shibe (Athletics); Charles Comiskey (White Sox); Ban Johnson (AL President); Robert L. Hedges (Browns); Frank J. Farrell (Highlanders). www.baseball-fever.com/showthread.php?40306-Historical-Ar...

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for finding this great site artolog. I'd say that you should continue identifying as many individuals as you can in the image.  We don't usually identify that many people in a single caption.  What we may do though, is identify Ban Johnson, as the AL president and note the dates: 1907-1909 the next time we update the record.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: You're welcome.. I think you should consider changing your caption from "American League Owners" to "American League Executives" or the like, as the league president and other team execs are in picture.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks that's a great suggestion, more fitting for the group pictured.
